definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Sea levels are rising in part because land-based ice is melting.
sentences.chinese: 海平面升高部分是由於地面上的冰在融化。

sentences.english: But regional changes in sea-level will not necessarily be the same as the global average.
sentences.chinese: 但是各地的海平面的變化程度可能不一樣。

sentences.english: Every drop of water that melts from the ice flows into the ocean, raising sea levels.
sentences.chinese: 冰層融化成的每一滴水匯入海洋後，擡高了海平面。

sentences.english: The generally accepted standard is 1020 watts per square meter at sea level.
sentences.chinese: 普遍接受的標準1020在海平面每平方米瓦。

sentences.english: Happy Spring tide with sea level, sea moon tide total health.
sentences.chinese: 春江花潮和海平面，海月亮潮整體健康。

sentences.english: If the polar ice caps melted how much would the oceans rise?
sentences.chinese: 假如極地冰冠融化了，海平面會上升多少？

sentences.english: They are found in every ocean, from the surface to the deep sea.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在每一個海洋找到它們，從海平面到深海區。

sentences.english: PRESSURE】The air pressure at sea level is nearly 15 pounds for each square inch.
sentences.chinese: 海平面上的大氣壓力每一平方英寸約有十五磅。

sentences.english: And scientists expect the rises to continue well into the future.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們預期，溫度和海平面在將來會繼續上升。

sentences.english: MSL elevations can be derived using an appropriate geoid model.
sentences.chinese: 海平面升高可以得出一個適當的大地水準面模型使用。

sentences.english: DOT】We watched the ship until it became a mere dot on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 我們看着船離去，直到它在海平面上成爲一個小點。

sentences.english: The problem of rising sea level is a potential threat for agriculture which is not to be neglected.
sentences.chinese: 海平面上升的潛在威脅，萬萬不可小視。

sentences.english: More volcanoes seem to erupt explosively with rising sea levels.
sentences.chinese: 似乎海平面上升會引起更多的火山大爆發。

sentences.english: The climate and sea level changes in the continental shelf were the same as the global changes.
sentences.chinese: 東海陸架的氣候和海平面變化與全球變化基本同步。

sentences.english: 2033 – The polar ice are melting. Greater levels of the oceans.
sentences.chinese: 2033年，極地冰川開始融化，海平面繼續上升。

sentences.english: The sharp-edged triangle poking out of the flat ocean was in fact the tip of a shipwreck.
sentences.chinese: 在海平面上突出的銳角三角形實際上是一條漁船。
